name: STARJOUST Duel
description:
STARJOUST Duel is a local multiplayer where two people shoot each other in 90 seconds to gain the highest score and to win the game.

FEATURES

- Local Hotseat Multiplayer
Play with your friend, anywhere and anytime. Only need one device to enjoy the game together!

- Competitive Gameplay
Duel and beat your friend and gain the highest score. You can also held a tournament with your friends!

- 5 Game Modes to Play
Play the original STARJOUST Duel on 'Nomal' mode or gone wild on 'Mayhem' mode. It's all your choice.

- 6 Power Ups!
Stun, Speed Up, and Triple Shot. All roads leads to Rome.

- No Ads!
Enjoy the duel without getting interupted with annoying ads.

If you have any suggestion, leave it on review. We'd love to hear it.

NOTE: Your device must support multi-touch to play the game
